SELECT TUI.USER_ID, TUI.USER_NAME, COALESCE(LEFTOVER.`leftover`, NULL) AS `leftover`, COALESCE(MON1.`mon`, NULL) AS `monReceipt`, COALESCE(TUE1.`tue`, NULL) AS `tueReceipt`, COALESCE(WED1.`wed`, NULL) AS `wedReceipt`, COALESCE(THU1.`thu`, NULL) AS `thuReceipt`, COALESCE(FRI1.`fri`, NULL) AS `friReceipt`, COALESCE(SAT1.`sat`, NULL) AS `satReceipt`, COALESCE(SUN1.`sun`, NULL) AS `sunReceipt`, COALESCE(MON2.`mon`, NULL) AS `monComplete`, COALESCE(TUE2.`tue`, NULL) AS `tueComplete`, COALESCE(WED2.`wed`, NULL) AS `wedComplete`, COALESCE(THU2.`thu`, NULL) AS `thuComplete`, COALESCE(FRI2.`fri`, NULL) AS `friComplete`, COALESCE(SAT2.`sat`, NULL) AS `satComplete`, COALESCE(SUN2.`sun`, NULL) AS `sunComplete` FROM T_USER_INFO TUI
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MANAGER_ID, COUNT(*) AS `leftover` FROM T_TICKET_INFO where status_cd != 'CLOSED' AND DELETE_YN = 'N' GROUP BY MANAGER_ID ) LEFTOVER ON TUI.USER_ID = LEFTOVER.MANAGER_ID
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MANAGER_ID, COUNT(*) AS `mon` FROM T_TICKET_INFO WHERE CREATE_DT >= CONCAT(#{mon} , ' 00:00:00') AND CREATE_DT <= CONCAT(#{mon} , ' 23:59:59') AND DELETE_YN = 'N' GROUP BY MANAGER_ID ) MON1 ON TUI.USER_ID = MON1.MANAGER_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MANAGER_ID, COUNT(*) AS `tue` FROM T_TICKET_INFO WHERE CREATE_DT >= CONCAT(#{tue} , ' 00:00:00') AND CREATE_DT <= CONCAT(#{tue} , ' 23:59:59') AND DELETE_YN = 'N' GROUP BY MANAGER_ID ) TUE1 ON TUI.USER_ID = TUE1.MANAGER_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MANAGER_ID, COUNT(*) AS `wed` FROM T_TICKET_INFO WHERE CREATE_DT >= CONCAT(#{wed} , ' 00:00:00') AND CREATE_DT <= CONCAT(#{wed} , ' 23:59:59') AND DELETE_YN = 'N' GROUP BY MANAGER_ID ) WED1 ON TUI.USER_ID = WED1.MANAGER_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MANAGER_ID, COUNT(*) AS `thu` FROM T_TICKET_INFO WHERE CREATE_DT >= CONCAT(#{thu} , ' 00:00:00') AND CREATE_DT <= CONCAT(#{thu} , ' 23:59:59') AND DELETE_YN = 'N' GROUP BY MANAGER_ID ) THU1 ON TUI.USER_ID = THU1.MANAGER_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MANAGER_ID, COUNT(*) AS `fri` FROM T_TICKET_INFO WHERE CREATE_DT >= CONCAT(#{fri} , ' 00:00:00') AND CREATE_DT <= CONCAT(#{fri} , ' 23:59:59') AND DELETE_YN = 'N' GROUP BY MANAGER_ID ) FRI1 ON TUI.USER_ID = FRI1.MANAGER_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MANAGER_ID, COUNT(*) AS `sat` FROM T_TICKET_INFO WHERE CREATE_DT >= CONCAT(#{sat} , ' 00:00:00') AND CREATE_DT <= CONCAT(#{sat} , ' 23:59:59') AND DELETE_YN = 'N' GROUP BY MANAGER_ID ) SAT1 ON TUI.USER_ID = SAT1.MANAGER_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MANAGER_ID, COUNT(*) AS `sun` FROM T_TICKET_INFO WHERE CREATE_DT >= CONCAT(#{sun} , ' 00:00:00') AND CREATE_DT <= CONCAT(#{sun} , ' 23:59:59') AND DELETE_YN = 'N' GROUP BY MANAGER_ID ) SUN1 ON TUI.USER_ID = SUN1.MANAGER_ID
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MANAGER_ID, COUNT(*) AS `mon` FROM T_TICKET_INFO WHERE COMPLETE_DT >= CONCAT(#{mon} , ' 00:00:00') AND COMPLETE_DT <= CONCAT(#{mon} , ' 23:59:59') AND DELETE_YN = 'N' GROUP BY MANAGER_ID ) MON2 ON TUI.USER_ID = MON2.MANAGER_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MANAGER_ID, COUNT(*) AS `tue` FROM T_TICKET_INFO WHERE COMPLETE_DT >= CONCAT(#{tue} , ' 00:00:00') AND COMPLETE_DT <= CONCAT(#{tue} , ' 23:59:59') AND DELETE_YN = 'N' GROUP BY MANAGER_ID ) TUE2 ON TUI.USER_ID = TUE2.MANAGER_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MANAGER_ID, COUNT(*) AS `wed` FROM T_TICKET_INFO WHERE COMPLETE_DT >= CONCAT(#{wed} , ' 00:00:00') AND COMPLETE_DT <= CONCAT(#{wed} , ' 23:59:59') AND DELETE_YN = 'N' GROUP BY MANAGER_ID ) WED2 ON TUI.USER_ID = WED2.MANAGER_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MANAGER_ID, COUNT(*) AS `thu` FROM T_TICKET_INFO WHERE COMPLETE_DT >= CONCAT(#{thu} , ' 00:00:00') AND COMPLETE_DT <= CONCAT(#{thu} , ' 23:59:59') AND DELETE_YN = 'N' GROUP BY MANAGER_ID ) THU2 ON TUI.USER_ID = THU2.MANAGER_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MANAGER_ID, COUNT(*) AS `fri` FROM T_TICKET_INFO WHERE COMPLETE_DT >= CONCAT(#{fri} , ' 00:00:00') AND COMPLETE_DT <= CONCAT(#{fri} , ' 23:59:59') AND DELETE_YN = 'N' GROUP BY MANAGER_ID ) FRI2 ON TUI.USER_ID = FRI2.MANAGER_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MANAGER_ID, COUNT(*) AS `sat` FROM T_TICKET_INFO WHERE COMPLETE_DT >= CONCAT(#{sat} , ' 00:00:00') AND COMPLETE_DT <= CONCAT(#{sat} , ' 23:59:59') AND DELETE_YN = 'N' GROUP BY MANAGER_ID ) SAT2 ON TUI.USER_ID = SAT2.MANAGER_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MANAGER_ID, COUNT(*) AS `sun` FROM T_TICKET_INFO WHERE COMPLETE_DT >= CONCAT(#{sun} , ' 00:00:00') AND COMPLETE_DT <= CONCAT(#{sun} , ' 23:59:59') AND DELETE_YN = 'N' GROUP BY MANAGER_ID ) SUN2 ON TUI.USER_ID = SUN2.MANAGER_ID
WHERE TUI.COMPANY_ID = 1 ORDER BY TUI.USER_ID
